pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diagnostic and prognostic meta-analysis (metamisc) // This package provides functions for diagnostic and prognostic research. It allows to perform meta-analysis of univariate (e.g. added value of a prognostic marker), bivariate (e.g. diagnostic test accuracy) and multivariate (e.g. previously published prediction model) statistics. Functionalities to update and externally validate prediction models are also implemented.
